title: Consistency of embed module
body:
## Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
The following is an issue to wrap up a bunch of specific items that will be tracked independently later, but we agreed in principle that the embed module should, in general, have two main means of usage:

- A consistent sklearn fit, transform, fit_transform adherence in the embedding classes, with appropriate warnings if it does not make sense.  
  - In the case of something like node2vec, there are no separate fit and transform steps, so calling these functions will either need to do `fit_transform` together and return results along with using the `warning` system, or raise an error.
- A consistent functional approach (call a function with some parameters and the graph and receive an embedding matrix in return)

@bdpedigo can we enumerate the specifics for every module in `embed` either in a response to this ticket or as separate tickets (I'll turn the former into the latter if we don't do it to start with)?  I just want to make sure we track everything through to completion
